25class kalmanFilter
26{
27 //System model
28 //Xt = A*xt-1 + Bt*Ut + epsilon
29 //Sensor model
30 // Yk = HkXk + Vk
31 // x = { xpos,ypos, xdot,ydot, ...}
32 public:
36 kalmanFilter(int i);
41 ~kalmanFilter();
47 void iterate(measurement meas);
53 void prediction();

73 void assign(measurement meas);
74 Eigen::MatrixXd cov_;//(7,7);
75 Eigen::VectorXd mean_;//(7);

77 Eigen::VectorXd mean_p_;//(7);
78 bool first_ = true;
79 private:
84 void measurementUpdate(Eigen::VectorXd measurement);
85 int id_;
86 std::string state_;
87 std::vector<double> process_noise_;
88 Eigen::MatrixXd Qt_;
89};
90// p(x) is a gaussian
91// p(x) = det(2*pi*Σ)^(-1/2)*exp(-1/2*(x-µ)^T*Σ^-1*(x-µ))
92// p(x) basicallly composed of mean µ and covariance Σ.
93// Posterior(Prediction), given Ut and Xt-1
94// p(xt|ut,xt-1) = det(2*pi*Rt)^-1/2 *
95// exp(-1/2(Xt-AtXt-1-BtUt)^T*Rt^-1*(-1/2(Xt-AtXt-1-BtUt)^)
96// Zt = Ct*Xt + εt1
97// P(Zt | xt) = det(2*pi*Qt)^(-1/2)*
98// exp(-1/2(Zt-Ct*Xt)^T*Qt^-1*(Zt-Ct*Xt))
99};
100#endif
